orangetick.title: Orange Tick
orangetick.desc: The Orange Tick is the special membership program of the IZTECH Software Society. It offers members discounts of up to 20% at partner venues in Urla, Gülbahçe, and İzmir. It also provides 20% off on society merchandise and priority access to limited-seat events such as entertainment activities. With a 1-year membership guarantee, the Orange Tick offers protection against loss or damage through the Digital Card System developed by the society. Click to explore the perks!

contact.subject: Inquiry about Orange Tick Membership

Hello,

I am {name} and my email is {email}. My phone number for my account is {phone} and I wanna get Orange Tick for this account.

Thank you.
